name: Steak Maker - Food Street Chef
description:
Hey guys! are you having a crazy Friday night hangout with your friends? If your answers is yes than you must be craving for some thing, cheesy, sizzling hot fast food. At that time nothing is better than a hot steak with all the best garnish and flavors! But can you make it all by yourself in kitchen? If your answer is no then you don’t have to worry any more since fast food fever is back especially for the home cooking chef because we bring a world of flavor into your life with the cooking of the most delicious & juicy Steaks in the culinary world. Test your cooking fever, start making your own steak by choosing and preparing all the ingredients necessary. Here you can easily grill and cook the meat by turning them on the grill. Crazy Cooking Steak Maker 3D is a wonderful addition in the all known steak maker games and fast food game where you can learn making steaks. Unleash your crazy creativity, choose from a huge selection of ingredients and make the kind of hot steak you like. We have gathered world best ingredients & recipes to make it happen for you. So grab your aprons & make some amazing steaks as you are a top crazy chef in kitchen world who has kitchen cooking fever! With more than 100 food toppings to choose from including veggies, meats, cheeses, herbs, spices to sure the kitchen cooking fever. Crazy Cooking Steak Maker 3D is an absolutely amazing kitchen cooking games who love to play maker games. Give your inner chef a new challenge! Bake, cook, chop, and grill with this great kitchen fever game! With this steak maker game you can be a crazy master chef and you can open your own steak house.

Everyone craves for steaks! In this kitchen game we have a multiple recipes for you. You can choose to make steak with salad, steak sandwich or a perfectly grilled steak. Start your day in the kitchen where all food ingredients are placed on the shelf. Experience the true kitchen environment with real chef. In Crazy Cooking Steak Maker 3D you will learn to cut a huge slice of cattle meat. Place it on the board & cut it into small pieces. Then add spices and special ingredients to flavor, make juicy steaks with special ingredients including salt, pepper, Sauces, Onions & Mushrooms. Now it’s time to flip & fry but be careful not to burn the meat! Later, you will be able to make yummy sauces & healthy salads which help you making delicious steaks in real life as well. So quench your kitchen cooking fever & be a master cooking chef and make some delicious and mouth watering steaks.

Features:
- Simple, fun and challenging, suitable for all ages
- Beautiful high quality HD graphics
- Reveal your creativity cooking real recipes
- Tons of different ingredients, toppings and flavors to choose from
